casebody.data:
ALEXANDER
v.
WAL-MART, et al. No. 588A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 29, 2004. Nicole D. Wray, for John Alexander. Zachary C. Bolen, Raleigh, for Wal-Mart, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of December 2004 for Extension of Time to File Amicus Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Amicus (North Carolina Academy of Trial Lawyers) shall have up to and including the 1st day of February 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of December 2004."
